search_results.snippet: From left to right: Young, Crosby, Nash, and Stills in a publicity photo in 1970. Crosby, Stills & Nash (CSN) were an American-British folk rock supergroup made up of David Crosby, Stephen Stills, and Graham Nash. They were known as Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young (CSNY) when joined by occasional fourth member Neil Young.
